dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1000 song clips with the music accompaniment and the singing voice recorded as left and right channels, respectively; and manual annotations of pitch. The total length of the dataset is 133 minutes.
dcterms:title: MIR-1K

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 230 solo stems (tracks) spanning a variety of musical instruments and voices from the MedleyDB dataset, and perfect f0 annotations of the stem (track) obtained via the analysis/synthesis method.
dcterms:title: MDB-stem-synth

dcterms:creator: G. Pirker
M. Wohlmayr
S. Petrik
F. Pernkopf
dcterms:description: A speech database for pitch tracking containing 20 English native speakers and the extracted pitch trajectories as a reference. This database consists of 4720 recorded sentences.
dcterms:title: PTDB-TUG
